item.title: IDAPython Plugin - Xref Counter
item.description: I created a small IDAPython which enumerates all of the xrefs in IDA within a given segment, counts the cross references, and then lists the address along with its xref count in a table. From there you can navigate to the actual address and export the data table to a csv file. You can find it at my github repository. I’ve found this to be a tremendous help in reverse engineering large executables (games) which use global variables.
